column2: "Na EWURADZE see Moses dɛ
column3: Afei na irubohu dza medze merebɛyɛ Farao: na nsa a ɔyɛ dzen do na ɔbɛma wɔakɔ
column4: na nsa a ɔyɛ dzen do na ɔbɛpam hɔn efi n'asaase do."

column2: "Na Nyankopɔn kasaa kyerɛɛ Moses
"na miyii moho mekyerɛɛ Abraham
column6: na me dzin YHWH (EWURADZE) no dze mamma wɔammfa ennhu me."

column2: "Na eso mama m'ahyɛmu a menye hɔn dzii no etsim
column3: dɛ medze Keenan asaase a ɔyɛ hɔn ahɔhobea asaase no a wɔyɛ do ahɔho no mebɛma hɔn."

column2: "Na nkyii so matse Israelmba a Egyptfo dzii hɔn nya no
column3: hɔn apempen; na makaa m'ahyɛmu no."

column2: "Dɛm ntsi se Israelmba dɛ
column4: na mibeyi hom mefi Egyptfo ndzesoadze no ase
column5: na meyi hom efi hɔn nkowaasom no mu
column6: na medze abasa a wɔatsɛw mu

column2: "na mafa hom ayɛ me man
column3: na mayɛ hom Nyankopɔn: na hom ehu dɛ emi nye Jehova hom Nyankopɔn a oyii hom fii Egyptfo ndzesoadze ase no."

column2: "Na medze hom bɔkɔ asaase a memaa me nsa do wɔ ho dɛ medze mebɛma Abraham
column5: na medze bɛma hom dɛ egyapadze: emi nye Jehova."

column2: "Na Moses kaa dɛm kyerɛɛ Israelmba no: na ahomtsew nye nkowaasom dzendzen ntsi woenntsie Moses."
"Na EWURADZE kaa kyerɛɛ Moses dɛ
column6: dɛ ɔmma Israelmba mfi asaase no do nkɔ."

column2: "Na Moses kasae wɔ EWURADZE enyim see dɛ
column4: Israelmba enntsie me; na ɔbɛyɛ dɛn na Farao betsie emi a wonntwaa m'anofamfa twatsia yi?"

column2: "Na EWURADZE kasaa kyerɛɛ Moses nye Aaron
column3: na ɔdze hyɛɛ hɔn nsa dɛ wɔnkɔ Israelmba
column5: nkeyi Israelmba no mfi Egypt asaase do."

column2: "Iyinom nye hɔn egyanom efi mu etsitsir: Israel n'abakan Reuben ne mbabanyin; Hanok
column5: nye Karmi: iyinom nye Reuben n'ebusuafo."

column2: "Na Simeon ne mbabanyin; Jemuel
column8: Keenannyi ɔbaa bi ne babanyin no: iyinom nye Simeon n'ebusuafo."

column2: "Na iyinom nye Levi ne mbabanyin no hɔn edzin dɛ mbrɛ hɔn mbusuasantsen tsetsee; Gerson
column4: nye Merari: na Levi no nkwaber mu mfe yɛ mfe ɔha eduasa esuon."

column2: "Gerson ne mbabanyin nye Libni na Simei
"Kohat ne mbabanyin; Amram
column5: Uziel: na Kohat no nkwamber mu mfe yɛ mfe ɔha eduasa ebiasa."

column2: "Merari ne mbabanyin nye Mahili nye Musi. Iyinom nye Levifo ebusuafo dɛ mbrɛ hɔn ebusuasantsen tsetsee."
"Na Amram faa n'egya akyerɛbaa Jokebed waar no; na ɔnye no woo Aaron nye Moses: na Amram no nkwaber mu mfe yɛ mfe ɔha eduasa esuon."
"Izhar ne mbabanyin nye Kora
"Uziel ne mbabanyin nye Misael
"Na Aaron faa Eliseba
column4: Nahson n'akyerɛbaa no waar no; na ɔnye no woo Nadab

column2: "Na Kora ne mbabanyin nye Assir
column4: na Abiasaf; iyinom nye Korafo ebusuafo."

column2: "Na Aaron ne babanyin Eleazar faa Putiel ne mbabaa mu baako waar no; na ɔnye no woo Finehas. Iyinom nye Levifo egyanom efi mu etsitsir dɛ mbrɛ hɔn ebusuafo tsetsee."
"Iyinom nye Aaron nye Moses no a EWURADZE see hɔn dɛ
column3: wonnyi Israelmba mfi Egypt asaase do dɛ mbrɛ hɔn dɔm tsetsee no."

column2: "Moses na Aaron nye hɔn a wɔkasaa kyerɛɛ Egypthen Farao dɛ wobeyi Israelmba efi Egypt akɔ no."
"Na ɔbaa dɛ da no a EWURADZE kasaa kyerɛɛ Moses wɔ Egypt asaase do no
column5: Emi nye EWURADZE: ka dza meka kyerɛ wo nyinara kyerɛ Egypthen Farao."

column2: "Na Moses kae wɔ EWURADZE enyim dɛ
column5: na Farao bɛyɛ dɛn etsie me?"
